segment.source: Interactive logon Message text for users attempting to log on (Windows 10)
segment.target: Interactive logon Message text for users attempting to log on (Windows 10)

segment.source: Describes the best practices, location, values, management, and security considerations for the Interactive logon Message text for users attempting to log on security policy setting.
segment.target: Describes the best practices, location, values, management, and security considerations for the Interactive logon Message text for users attempting to log on security policy setting.

segment.source: Interactive logon: Message text for users attempting to log on
segment.target: Interactive logon: Message text for users attempting to log on

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Describes the best practices, location, values, management, and security considerations for the Interactive logon: Message text for users attempting to log on security policy setting.
segment.target: Describes the best practices, location, values, management, and security considerations for the Interactive logon: Message text for users attempting to log on security policy setting.

segment.source: Reference
segment.target: Reference

segment.source: The Interactive logon: Message text for users attempting to log on and Interactive logon: Message title for users attempting to log on policy settings are closely related.
segment.target: The Interactive logon: Message text for users attempting to log on and Interactive logon: Message title for users attempting to log on policy settings are closely related.

segment.source: Interactive logon: Message text for users attempting to log on specifies a text message to be displayed to users when they log on.
segment.target: Interactive logon: Message text for users attempting to log on specifies a text message to be displayed to users when they log on.

segment.source: Interactive logon: Message title for users attempting to log on specifies a title to appear in the title bar of the window that contains the text message.
segment.target: Interactive logon: Message title for users attempting to log on specifies a title to appear in the title bar of the window that contains the text message.

segment.source: This text is often used for legal reasons—for example, to warn users about the ramifications of misusing company information, or to warn them that their actions might be audited.
segment.target: This text is often used for legal reasons—for example, to warn users about the ramifications of misusing company information, or to warn them that their actions might be audited.

segment.source: Not using this warning-message policy setting leaves your organization legally vulnerable to trespassers who unlawfully penetrate your network.
segment.target: Not using this warning-message policy setting leaves your organization legally vulnerable to trespassers who unlawfully penetrate your network.

segment.source: Legal precedents have established that organizations that display warnings to users who connect to their servers over a network have a higher rate of successfully prosecuting trespassers.
segment.target: Legal precedents have established that organizations that display warnings to users who connect to their servers over a network have a higher rate of successfully prosecuting trespassers.

segment.source: When these policy settings are configured, users will see a dialog box before they can log on to the server console.
segment.target: When these policy settings are configured, users will see a dialog box before they can log on to the server console.

segment.source: Possible values
segment.target: Possible values

segment.source: The possible values for this setting are:
segment.target: The possible values for this setting are:

segment.source: User-defined text
segment.target: User-defined text

segment.source: Not defined
segment.target: Not defined

segment.source: Best practices
segment.target: Best practices

segment.source: It is advisable to set Interactive logon: Message text for users attempting to log on to a value similar to one of the following:
segment.target: It is advisable to set Interactive logon: Message text for users attempting to log on to a value similar to one of the following:

segment.source: IT IS AN OFFENSE TO CONTINUE WITHOUT PROPER AUTHORIZATION.
segment.target: IT IS AN OFFENSE TO CONTINUE WITHOUT PROPER AUTHORIZATION.

segment.source: This system is restricted to authorized users.
segment.target: This system is restricted to authorized users.

segment.source: Individuals who attempt unauthorized access will be prosecuted.
segment.target: Individuals who attempt unauthorized access will be prosecuted.

segment.source: If you are unauthorized, terminate access now.
segment.target: If you are unauthorized, terminate access now.

segment.source: Click OK to indicate your acceptance of this information.
segment.target: Click OK to indicate your acceptance of this information.

segment.source: Important: Any warning that you display in the title or text should be approved by representatives from your organization's legal and human resources departments.
segment.target: Important: Any warning that you display in the title or text should be approved by representatives from your organization's legal and human resources departments.

segment.source: Location
segment.target: Location

segment.source: Computer ConfigurationWindows SettingsSecurity SettingsLocal PoliciesSecurity Options
segment.target: Computer ConfigurationWindows SettingsSecurity SettingsLocal PoliciesSecurity Options

segment.target: Default values are also listed on the policy’s property page.

segment.source: Policy management
segment.target: Policy management

segment.source: This section describes different requirements to help you manage this policy.
segment.target: This section describes different requirements to help you manage this policy.

segment.source: Restart requirement
segment.target: Restart requirement

segment.source: None.
segment.target: None.

segment.source: Changes to this policy become effective without a device restart when they are saved locally or distributed through Group Policy.
segment.target: Changes to this policy become effective without a device restart when they are saved locally or distributed through Group Policy.

segment.source: Security considerations
segment.target: Security considerations

segment.source: This section describes how an attacker might exploit a feature or its configuration, how to implement the countermeasure, and the possible negative consequences of countermeasure implementation.
segment.target: This section describes how an attacker might exploit a feature or its configuration, how to implement the countermeasure, and the possible negative consequences of countermeasure implementation.

segment.source: There are two policy settings that relate to logon displays:
segment.target: There are two policy settings that relate to logon displays:

segment.source: Interactive logon: Message text for users attempting to log on
segment.target: Interactive logon: Message text for users attempting to log on

segment.source: Interactive logon: Message title for users attempting to log on
segment.target: Interactive logon: Message title for users attempting to log on

segment.source: The first policy setting specifies a text message that displays to users when they log on, and the second policy setting specifies a title for the title bar of the text message window.
segment.target: The first policy setting specifies a text message that displays to users when they log on, and the second policy setting specifies a title for the title bar of the text message window.

segment.source: Many organizations use this text for legal purposes; for example, to warn users about the ramifications of misuse of company information, or to warn them that their actions may be audited.
segment.target: Many organizations use this text for legal purposes; for example, to warn users about the ramifications of misuse of company information, or to warn them that their actions may be audited.

segment.source: Vulnerability
segment.target: Vulnerability

segment.source: Users often do not understand the importance of security practices.
segment.target: Users often do not understand the importance of security practices.

segment.source: However, the display of a warning message before logon may help prevent an attack by warning malicious or uninformed users about the consequences of their misconduct before it happens.
segment.target: However, the display of a warning message before logon may help prevent an attack by warning malicious or uninformed users about the consequences of their misconduct before it happens.

segment.source: It may also help reinforce corporate policies by notifying employees of appropriate policies during the logon process.
segment.target: It may also help reinforce corporate policies by notifying employees of appropriate policies during the logon process.

segment.source: Countermeasure
segment.target: Countermeasure

segment.source: Configure the Interactive logon: Message text for users attempting to log on and Interactive logon: Message title for users attempting to log on settings to an appropriate value for your organization.
segment.target: Configure the Interactive logon: Message text for users attempting to log on and Interactive logon: Message title for users attempting to log on settings to an appropriate value for your organization.

segment.source: Note: Any warning message that displays should be approved by your organization's legal and human resources representatives.
segment.target: Note: Any warning message that displays should be approved by your organization's legal and human resources representatives.

segment.source: Potential impact
segment.target: Potential impact

segment.source: Users see a message in a dialog box before they can log on to the server console.
segment.target: Users see a message in a dialog box before they can log on to the server console.

segment.target: Related topics
